item.value: \Rpublic class Test \{\R\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\t// TODO Auto-generated method stub\RScanner sc = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\t\R\t\tHashMap<String, Integer> nations = new HashMap<String, Integer>\(\);\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("나라 이름과 인구를 5개 입력하세요\."\);\R\t\tfor\(int i = 0; i < 5; i\+\+\) \{\R\t\t\tSystem\.out\.print\("나라 이름, 인구 >> "\);\R\t\t\tnations\.put\(sc\.next\(\), sc\.nextInt\(\)\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\t\R\t\tSet<String> keys = nations\.keySet\(\);\R\t\tIterator<String> it = keys\.iterator\(\);\R\t\t\R\t\tint max = 0;\R\t\tString max_cont = null;\R\t\twhile\(it\.hasNext\(\)\) \{\R\t\t\tString key = it\.next\(\);\R\t\t\tint value = nations\.get\(key\);\R\t\t\tif\(max < value\) \{\R\t\t\t\tmax = value;\R\t\t\t\tmax_cont = key;\R\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\}\R\t\t\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("제일 인구가 많은 나라는 \(" \+ max_cont \+ ", " \+ nations\.get\(max_cont\) \+ "\)"\);\R\t\R\R\t\}\R\R\}\R

import java\.util\.Scanner;\R\Rpublic class Week1_2 \{\R\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\t// TODO Auto-generated method stub\R\t\tScanner sc = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\t\R\t\tString alp;\R\t\tString Alp;\R\t\tchar c;\R\t\tint i;\R\t\t\R\t\twhile\(true\) \{\R\t \tSystem\.out\.print\("문자를 입력하세요: "\);\R\t \talp = sc\.next\(\);\R\t \t\R\t \tif\(alp\.equals\("0"\)\)\R\t \t\tbreak;\R\t \t\R\t \tfor\(i = 0; i < alp\.length\(\); i\+\+\) \{\R\t \tif\(alp>=65 && alp<=90\) // 대문자이면\R alp \+=32; // 소문자로 변환\R else if\(change\[i\]>=97 && change\[i\]<=122\) // 소문자이면\R change\[i\]-=32;\R\t \t\}\R\t \t\R\R\R\t \tSystem\.out\.println\(alp\.charAt\(0\)\);\R\t\t\}\R\R\t\}\R\R\R\}\R

import java\.util\.Scanner;\R\Rpublic class Week1_2 \{\R\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\t// TODO Auto-generated method stub\R\t\tScanner sc = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\t\R\t\tString alp;\R\t\tString Alp;\R\t\tchar c;\R\t\tint i;\R\t\t\R\t\twhile\(true\) \{\R\t \tSystem\.out\.print\("문자를 입력하세요: "\);\R\t \talp = sc\.next\(\);\R\t \t\R\t \tif\(alp\.equals\("0"\)\)\R\t \t\tbreak;\R\t \t\R\t \tfor\(i = 0; i < alp\.length\(\); i\+\+\) \{\R\t \tif\(alp>=65 && alp<=90\) // 대문자이면\R alp \+=32; // 소문자로 변환\R else if\(change\[i\]>=97 && change\[i\]<=122\) // 소문자이면\R change\[i\]-=32;\R\t \t \}\R\t \t\R\R\R\t \tSystem\.out\.println\(alp\.charAt\(0\)\);\R\t\t\}\R\R\t\}\R\R\R\}\R
